---
title: "Exercise 1.2: Visualising BAM files"
---

- Click into the terminal in RStudio
- Type `samtools tview data/Sample.bam`, and click `<Enter>`.
- Follow the tips below to move around the alignment with your cursor.
- **Task 1**: Can you identify Variants, i.e. systematic differences from the Reference?
- **Task 2**: Also try `samtools tview data/Sample.bam --reference data/hg19_MT.fasta`

::: callout-tip
- Use your cursors to move left and right
- Use space or Ctrl-L to make bigger jumps to the right
- Use or Ctrl-H for bigger jumps to the left.
- Type `?` to get a quick help
- Type `q` to quit.
:::
